content: Hopefully a straightforward PR, for showing that a predicate holds on a monadic value generated by List.foldlM or List.foldrM, by showing it holds at every step along the way. We already have the Array versions of these.
I applied Eric's suggestions (they were unobjectionable) and merged.
Eric's suggestion also applied to the other lemma, so I did that in a follow-up PR which I merged myself.
